81 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
82 // Class stMNode
83 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
108 class stMNode{
109  public:
113  enum stMNodeType{
117  INDEX = 0x4449, // In little endian "ID"
118 
122  LEAF = 0x464C // In little endian "LF"
123  };//end stNodeType
124 
128  virtual ~stMNode(){
129  }//end ~stMNode()
130 
137  stNodeType GetNodeType(){
138  return Header->Type;
139  }//end GetNodeType
140 
146  stPage * GetPage(){
147  return Page;
148  }//end GetPage
149 
155  stPageID GetPageID(){
156  return Page->GetPageID();
157  }//end GetPage
158 
165  static stMNode * CreateNode(stPage * page);
166 
175  int GetNumberOfEntries(){
176  return this->Header->Occupation;
177  }//end GetNumberOfEntries
178 
190  virtual int AddEntry(stSize size, const stByte * object) = 0;
191 
202  virtual const stByte * GetObject(int id)=0;
203 
214  virtual stSize GetObjectSize(int id)=0;
215 
219  virtual stDistance GetMinimumRadius()=0;
220 
224  void RemoveAll(){
225 
226  #ifdef __stDEBUG__
227  stNodeType type;
228  type = Header->Type;
229  Page->Clear();
230  Header->Type = type;
231  #else
232  this->Header->Occupation = 0;
233  #endif //__stDEBUG__
234  }//end RemoveAll
235 
239  static stSize GetGlobalOverhead(){
240  return sizeof(stMNodeHeader);
241  }//end GetGlobalOverhead()
242 
243  protected:
247  #pragma pack(1)
248  typedef struct stMNodeHeader{
252  stNodeType Type;
253 
257  stCount Occupation;
258  } stMNodeHeader; //end stHeader
259  #pragma pack()
260 
264  stMNodeHeader * Header;
265 
269  stPage * Page;
270 
276  stMNode(stPage * page){
277  this->Page = page;
278  Header = (stMNodeHeader *)(this->Page->GetData());
279  }//end stMNode
280 };//end stMNode

282 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
283 // Class stMIndexNode
284 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
313 // +-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
314 // | Type | Occupation | PgID0 | Dist0 | Radius0 | OffSet0 |...|PgIDn | Distn | Radiusn | OffSetn | <-- blankspace --> |Objn |...|Obj0 |
315 // +-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
316 class stMIndexNode: public stMNode{
317  public:
321  #pragma pack(1)
322  typedef struct stMIndexEntry{
326  stPageID PageID;
327 
331  stDistance Distance;
332 
336  stDistance Radius;
337 
343  stSize Offset;
344  } stMIndexEntry; //end stIndexEntry
345  #pragma pack()
346 
358  stMIndexNode(stPage * page, bool create = false);
359 
373  stMIndexEntry & GetIndexEntry(int id){
374  #ifdef __stDEBUG__
375  if ((id < 0) && (id >= GetNumberOfEntries())){
376  throw invalid_argument("id value is out of range.");
377  }//end if
378  #endif //__stDEBUG__
379 
380  return Entries[id];
381  }//end GetIndexEntry
382 
401  virtual int AddEntry(stSize size, const stByte * object);
402 
406  int GetRepresentativeEntry();
407 
418  const stByte * GetObject(int id);
419 
429  stSize GetObjectSize(int id);
430 
439  void RemoveEntry(int id);
440 
444  virtual stDistance GetMinimumRadius();
445 
449  static stSize GetIndexEntryOverhead(){
450  return sizeof(stMIndexEntry);
451  }//end GetIndexEntryOverhead()
452 
453  private:
454 
458  stMIndexEntry * Entries;
459 
463  stSize GetFree();
464 
465 };//end stMIndexPage

495 // +--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
496 // | Type | Occupation | Dist0 | OffSet0 | Distn | OffSetn | <-- blankspace --> |Objn |...|Obj0 |
497 // +--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
498 class stMLeafNode: public stMNode{
499  public:
503  #pragma pack(1)
504  typedef struct stMLeafEntry{
508  stDistance Distance;
509 
515  stSize Offset;
516  } stMLeafEntry; //end stLeafEntry
517  #pragma pack()
518 
530  stMLeafNode(stPage * page, bool create = false);
531 
545  stMLeafEntry &GetLeafEntry(int id){
546  #ifdef __stDEBUG__
547  if ((id < 0) && (id >= GetNumberOfEntries())){
548  throw invalid_argument("id value is out of range.");
549  }//end if
550  #endif //__stDEBUG__
551 
552  return Entries[id];
553  }//end GetLeafEntry

637 };//end stMLeafNode
